title: [SDN_O2A_TOM2] Enabler: PMA-ISEM Interface: create generic solution for hardcoded Order Line Attribute mapping
description:
Description
SN table for specifying fixed data for given PMA-ISEM object and attribute
SN table for specifying compound values for given PMA-ISEM object and attribute
SN table for specifying data from Order Line Item Attribute table for given PMA-ISEM object and attribute
SN table for specifying data from a given reference field inside Product Inventory Item (e.g. Location, Product Model) for given PMA-ISEM object and attribute

components.title: SDN Altbestand SDLA - B2B Software Defined Networks
